label: Temperatures
info:
Temperature readings, triggered every 2 
seconds (note that the PID algorith has this 
frequency hard coded into it, and those 
functions will need to be modified if the 
trigger frequency is changed). Also smoothing 
and formating for temperature display.

label: Mash buttons
info:
Buttons for mash control. These also display 
state.

label: Mash controller
info:
Everything related to mash/RIMS PID control, in
addition to interlock features to prevent RIMS
use when pump is inactive or when the boil 
element is in use.

label: Boil buttons
info:
Buttons related to controlling the boil.
These buttons also display state.

label: Boil controller
info:
PID functionality, as well as an interlock 
scheme to prevent multiple elements from being
used at one time.

label: PID outputs
info:
This flow displays output from the PID 
algorithm. This can be useful for tuning 
purposes.

label: Element outputs
info:
Routing to GPIO, as well as displays for element
output in duty %

label: Pump control (Brew2)
info:
This flow provides a button to turn a pump on 
and off. The colour of the pump button reflects
its status. The pump has one restriction in that 
it can not be turned off while RIMS is active.
Such attempts are blocked, with a notification
provided to the user.

label: UI navigation and style
info:
This tab contains a collection of UI features.
* CSS overide to ensure dashboard is only 1 or 2 columns
* Centre "group" titles
* Navigation buttons

label: Volume
info:
A pressure sensor is read by an analog input
board. The pressure reading is then converted
to cmH20 and volume and displayed.

name: Volume conversion
func:
msg.payload = 1.89 + (msg.payload * 21.5 * 21.5 * 3.141526 / 1000);
return msg;

name: WC calibration
func:
msg.payload = -11.182129 + 1.392048*msg.payload 
return msg;

name: Centre group titles
format:
<style>
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
  text-align: center;
}
body {
  overflow: hidden; /* Hide scrollbars */
}
.nr-dashboard-theme ng-scope layout-column {
  overflow: hidden; /* Hide scrollbars */
}
</style>

name: Tap 1 text
format:
2019 Cider 6.5%
An intense New World-style cider fermented on the pomace of weird little super tannic, red-fleshed crab apples.

name: Tap 2 text
format:
Pils 5.0%
A Czech-style pilsner, kinda. Whirlpool and dry hopped with Mt. Hood. Easy mode malt, hard mode yeast, and soft soft water.

name: Tap 3 text
format:
DH Sour 6.5%
A blend of well aged golden sours, conditioned on 2nd use crabapple pomace (see tap 1), and dry hopped with tons of Mosaic

name: Tap 4 text
format:
Blueberry Sour 6.5%
Stainless aged golden sour base refermented with 200g/l of Costco's finest frozen wild blueberries.
